summary: An update of my original Knight of Order sword with some tweaks and fixes.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 7 (Seven) scabbard colors to the original Knight of Order sword I made a while ago. I realised that red and gold might not suit every player's outfit choice. It certainly didn't go with my Lapis Lazuli armor, that's for sure. I've added seven colors:
-Black
-Blue
-Red
-Green
-Yellow
-Purple
-Brown
Additional colors can be added upon request.
Just like my original you can find [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72288/?]here[/url] they retain the original damage stats from Oblivion, however now they act like silver weapons. They can be crafted with leather, quicksilver, and regular silver. There's no need to gather dyes (yet) for the scabbard. See images below.

author: Jane Harris
